creator: Vavasour, Lt. M.
extent: 1 map : photocopy ; 27.1 x 41 cm. on sheet 28.1 x 43.3 cm.
notes: References include "dwelling house; Indian quarters; new dwelling house and stores, 2 storied of squared lumber; Metis houses, Blacksmiths shop. Pickets 25 feet high. Each Bastion contains an iron gun and is loop-holed. The buildings and pickets are in bad repair excepting..." Photocopy of a plan in the National Collection.
subject: Edmonton (Alta.)
North Saskatchewan River (Alta.)
title: Plan of Fort Edmonton on the Saskatchewan River
